en_clean: [Number 2: Remember how you'll keep your Experience and Craft Skills no matter what, but your party's progress is reset every time you loop?]

en_clean: This... This once-changed King!!! I'll... I'll--!!!

jp_clean: この... 一度きりの変化を起こす王に！！ わたし... きっと――！！

en_raw: Belle...
en_clean: Belle...
jp_clean: ベル...

en_raw: We should get going.
en_clean: We should get going.
jp_clean: 先へ進もう。

en_raw: I'm predicting there will be a strong Sadness in the next room for you to cut into ribbons, Mirabelle.
en_clean: I'm predicting there will be a strong Sadness in the next room for you to cut into ribbons, Mirabelle.
jp_raw: この先の部屋には手ごわい哀し身がいそうだぞ。\!思いの丈をぶつけるといい、ミラベル。
jp_clean: この先の部屋には手ごわい哀し身がいそうだぞ。思いの丈をぶつけるといい、ミラベル。

en_raw: ...  Okay.
en_clean: ...  Okay.

en_raw: Let's get going, everyone.
en_clean: Let's get going, everyone.
jp_clean: みんな、行こう。

en_raw: (You get ready, and slice the door.)
en_clean: (You get ready, and slice the door.)
jp_raw: \m[clear](ナイフを取り出し、扉に切りかかる。)
jp_clean: (ナイフを取り出し、扉に切りかかる。)

en_raw: (The KeyKnife broke on impact.)
en_clean: (The KeyKnife broke on impact.)
jp_raw: \m[clear](キーナイフは衝撃で壊れてしまった。)
jp_clean: (キーナイフは衝撃で壊れてしまった。)

en_raw: (Maybe it wasn't sharpened enough...?)
en_clean: (Maybe it wasn't sharpened enough...?)
jp_clean: (研ぎ足りなかった...？)

en_raw: (That's too bad... You're sure you could've found a use for it elsewhere.)
en_clean: (That's too bad... You're sure you could've found a use for it elsewhere.)
jp_raw: (残念だ...\!\ 他の場所でも使い道はありそうだったのに。)
jp_clean: (残念だ... 他の場所でも使い道はありそうだったのに。)

en_raw: (But at least the gate is opened.)
en_clean: (But at least the gate is opened.)
jp_raw: (でも、少なくとも、門は開いたぞ。)
jp_clean: (でも、少なくとも、門は開いたぞ。)
